allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Connect FinnTrack iOS app to finntracker.org live tracking

- Configure APIConfig to read base URL and API key from Info.plist
- Connect to production API at api.finntracker.org
- Add location usage description strings for iOS permissions
- Simplify race start flow \(use boat name as ID, skip join step\)
- Update default race ID to TRAINING-2026-R01
- Swap Boat Name and Race ID positions in UI
- Add debug logging for position updates

The app now successfully sends real-time position updates to the
finntracker.org backend, visible on the live tracking website.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
